data.text: Bhukala a Nnungu bhatendaga bheleketa na ashaambuje yetu, kupitila ashinkulondola bhabho papagwinji na kwa namuna yaigwinji,
ikabheje agano mobha ga kumpelo gano, a Nnungu bhanabheleketa na uwe kupitila Bhanabhabho. Bhubhaabhishile kubha bhalishi bha indu yowe, na kupitila bhenebho bhashipanganya shilambolyo.

Bhenebho ni nnga'nyimo gwa ukonjelo gwa a Nnungu, nnandanyo gwa a Nnungu bhayene, gubhabhishile indu yowe kwa lilobhe lyabho likwete mashili, bhakamaliyeje kwaaleshelelanga bhandunji yambi, gubhatemi kunkono nnilo gwa Bhakulungwa a Nnungu kunnungu.
Mwana ni nkulungwa kupunda ashimalaika, malinga ukulungwa gwa lina lyabho libhapegwilwe na a Nnungu kupunda mena gabhonji.
Pabha a Nnungu bhangannugulila nkali kamo, malaika jwabho jumo,
Ikabheje a Nnungu pubhaatumile bhanabhabho, lyelo lyabho bhalinkuti,
Ikabheje gaka Mwana, a Nnungu bhakuti,
Mmwe nnaapinga aki na nkaapinga ya ilebho.
Nkupinga kwiipindanya mbuti likoti, na ipinga tindiganywa mbuti iwalo.
Bhuli apali malaika jubhakunnugulilaga a Nnungu kuti,
Igala ashi malaikabha ni nndi? Bhalabhonji ni ashi mbumu bhakwatumishilanga a Nnungu na bhaatumwanga na bhenebho kwa ligongo lya kwaajangutilanga bhalishi bha ntapulo.
